mapper.insert: insert into details(detailsid , ordercode , filmid , num , price , cityid , cinemaid , viewdate ) values(#{detailsid} , #{ordercode} , #{filmid} , #{num} , #{price} , #{cityid} , #{cinemaid} , #{viewdate} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.filmname , c.cityname , d.cinemaname from details a , film b , city c , cinema d where 1=1 and a.filmid = b.filmid and a.cityid = c.cityid and a.cinemaid = d.cinemaid order by detailsid desc

select a.* , b.filmname , c.cityname , d.cinemaname from details a , film b , city c , cinema d where 1=1 and a.filmid = b.filmid and a.cityid = c.cityid and a.cinemaid = d.cinemaid and detailsid=#{detailsid} order by detailsid desc

select a.* , b.filmname , c.cityname , d.cinemaname from details a , film b , city c , cinema d where 1=1 and a.filmid = b.filmid and a.cityid = c.cityid and a.cinemaid = d.cinemaid
and a.ordercode like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{ordercode}, '%'))
and a.filmid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{filmid}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.price like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{price}, '%'))
and a.cityid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{cityid}, '%'))
and a.cinemaid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{cinemaid}, '%'))
and a.viewdate like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{viewdate}, '%'))
